mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wf_process_definition WHERE definition_key = #{definitionKey} AND is_active = 1 ORDER BY version DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM wf_process_definition WHERE definition_type = #{definitionType} AND is_active = 1 ORDER BY version DESC
SELECT * FROM wf_process_definition WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY definition_type, version DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wf_process_definition (definition_key, definition_name, definition_type, process_xml, process_json, version, is_active, description, create_user, create_time) VALUES (#{definitionKey}, #{definitionName}, #{definitionType}, #{processXml}, #{processJson}, #{version}, #{isActive}, #{description}, #{createUser}, NOW())
mapper.delete: UPDATE wf_process_definition SET is_active = 0 WHERE definition_id = #{definitionId}
